font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 复兴： a restoration to use, acceptance, activity, or vigor
【例】 Let’s witness the resurgence of classical school. 让我们见证古典乐派的复兴。
【近】 reanimation, rebirth, regeneration, rejuvenation, renewal, resurrection, resuscitation, revitalization
【反】 decay, degradation, deterioration, downfall, ebb, fall 衰落
【派】 resurgent adj. 正在复兴的
